title: FFA Ranked Gamemode
body:
Instead of removing Crystal Scar, turn it into a 10 man free for all mode, where each player has to select/vote for a champion they want to play, and the champion with the most votes is chosen for all 10 players to play.

The rules would be simple, have a 30minute timer or a kill limit of like 20 kills.

replies.body:
Or you could add more spawn points. Get rid of the current sites and then make 8 more spawn points and make it a 10-man solo match.

1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1 = fun
wont work simply because people can team up and boost accounts i think but none the less i would love to play that
